text: The Râușor is a right tributary of the Râul Târgului in Romania. It discharges into the Râușor Reservoir, which is drained by the Râul Târgului. Its length is and its basin size is . ==References== * Trasee turistice - județul Argeș Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Argeș County
title: Râușor (Râul Târgului)
